channel.title: This Is A Bad Idea! - by Phisticated [Collab]
channel.description: Hello! I’m looking to publish a new album by mid-December called This Is A Bad Idea! There aren’t a lot of tracks finished, but I plan on making this my first album with lyrics to a song. I already have a rapper on the track but I need at most 2 other vocal artists and 3 collab artists.![image|690x458](upload://mmVERoFfVw7IdGLXuJ5wcLWZIab.jpeg)

item.title: This Is A Bad Idea! - by Phisticated [Collab]
item.dc:creator: Phisticated
item.description:
Hello! I’m looking to publish a new album by mid-December called This Is A Bad Idea! There aren’t a lot of tracks finished, but I plan on making this my first album with lyrics to a song. I already have a rapper on the track but I need at most 2 other vocal artists and 3 collab artists.

Read full topic
item.source: This Is A Bad Idea! - by Phisticated [Collab]
